text: Ra (ya'aîkubale) bhannu bhayoh he mera putraharu! Timi sabai e'utai dhokabata najanu baru beglabeglai dhokabata pravesa garnu. Ma allahako tarphabata a'une kunai pani cijala'i timiharubata hata'una saktina. Hukuma matra allahako caldacha. Mero purna bharosa usai mathi cha, hareka bharosa garnevalala'i usaimathi bharosa garnupardacha
